item.title: Final Thesis Presentation | Andrew Wong
item.description: “Smart” Vacuum Cleaners An Audit Into The Security and Integrity of IoT Systems Andrew Wong | UNSW Sydney img[round] { border-radius: 10px; } Today’s Agenda Thesis B plan Thesis B review Thesis B retrospective Thesis C revised plan Statement How have manufacturers of IoT / smart home devices addressed the increasing concerns of digital privacy and product security?

item.title: Seminar A | Andrew Wong
item.description: “Smart” Vacuum Cleaners An Audit Into The Security and Integrity of IoT Systems Andrew Wong | UNSW Sydney Introduction Internet of Things (IoT) and Smart Home devices are everywhere. Q: Can we completely trust a device’s {security, privacy}?
